titles.title: Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2007
To adjust the boundaries of Pisgah National Forest in McDowell County, North Carolina.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 11/13/2007--Introduced. Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2007 - Modifies the boundaries of the Pisgah National Forest in McDowell County, North Carolina, to provide for the inclusion of certain private land and Forest Service land in the Forest. Requires an owner's consent to acquire the private land.
